title: Sergey Gridin
text:
Sergey Gridin (; born 20 May 1987) is a <a href="Kazakhs">Kazakh</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player, who most recently played for <a href="FC%20Zhetysu">FC Zhetysu</a>.
Career.
Club.
In March 2015, Gridin signed with <a href="Latvian%20Higher%20League">Latvian Higher League</a> side <a href="FK%20Spartaks%20J%C5%ABrmala">FK Spartaks Jūrmala</a>. In July 2014, Gridin moved to <a href="FC%20Ordabasy">FC Ordabasy</a> on a six-month contract from <a href="FC%20Atyrau">FC Atyrau</a>. In February 2016 Gridin signed for newly promoted <a href="FC%20Akzhayik">FC Akzhayik</a>.
International.
Gridin scored twice on his national team debut, a 2–1 victory over <a href="Azerbaijan%20national%20football%20team">Azerbaijan</a>, in a <a href="2012%20UEFA%20European%20Football%20Championship">Euro 2012</a> qualifier on 3 June 2011.
